We've added some new features below:
- Display and control music playback within app*
- Select equalizer presets on WF-1000X
- "Standby with power saving" function on WI-1000X
* Limited to compatible devices.

The app's user-friendliness has been enhanced as a result of the following changes and new features.

• The notification sound of Adaptive Sound Control emitted when switching can be muted.
